entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
